title: Asking to make a reservation through the online reservation system

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Good evening, do you have a reservation with us tonight?
turns.user_response_option_en: Actually, I was hoping to reserve a table for two tonight through your online reservation system. Can you guide me through the process?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 안녕하세요, 오늘 밤 예약이 있으신가요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 온라인 예약 시스템을 통해 오늘 밤 2인용 테이블을 예약하려고 합니다. 예약 절차를 안내해 주시겠어요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Good evening, do you have a reservation with us tonight?
